alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 20 at 9:07PM AKST until November 21 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Shishmaref and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly gales over the Northern Bering Sea and the Chukchi Sea will continue into Monday night, then decrease slowly on Tuesday. This will cause sea levels to rise two to four feet above the normal high tide line and waves will push to the top of the beach. The worst conditions will be along south facing shores.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
